meanings.sent1: I sprinkled breadcrumbs on top of the casserole before baking it.
meanings.sent2: The birds pecked at the breadcrumbs scattered on the park bench.
meanings.sent3: The ant thought the breadcrumb was a giant mountain in its path.
meanings.sent4: The breadcrumbs of wisdom left by the old man guided the young traveler.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked breadcrumbs filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A trail of small pieces of bread, used to guide someone back to a place
meanings.sent1: Hansel and Gretel followed the breadcrumbs to find their way home.
meanings.sent2: The hiker left breadcrumbs along the path to ensure he could find his way back.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel rearranged the breadcrumbs to lead the lost cat in circles.
meanings.sent4: The breadcrumbs of kindness she left behind always brought her friends back to her.
meanings.sent5: The breadcrumbs of clues led the detective straight to the culprit.

meanings.definition: A trail of links on a website, used for navigation
meanings.sent1: The website's breadcrumbs at the top helped users easily navigate through the pages.
meanings.sent2: By following the breadcrumbs at the bottom of the page, I found my way back to the homepage.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky mouse clicked on the breadcrumbs, hoping they would lead to a cheese page.
meanings.sent4: The breadcrumbs of hyperlinks guided the user seamlessly through the website.
meanings.sent5: The breadcrumbs of categories made browsing the online store a breeze.
